In adults with drug use disorders or using drugs, are digital or telemedicine interventions effective? Recommendation (new): Digital interventions should be considered for adults using drugs or with drug use disorders. They should not replace provision of other forms of interventions and should ensure informed consent, safety, confidentiality, privacy and security.
